decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting opponent's strategies using a variety of removal spells and powerful threats. It also utilizes graveyard recursion with cards like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to generate value. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by keeping their resources in check and gradually overpowering them with its powerful creatures. It also has some planeswalkers to provide additional card advantage and win conditions. The overall strategy revolves around maintaining control of the game and grinding out a victory.
